_header: Look on this writing man for thy devotion
_description: An exhortation to hear Mass — thirteen stanzas rhyme royal

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Loke on þis wrytyng both old & yonge man for þi
                    devocionWalk here beside yf you can esspye…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Her it forth to þe end with meke ententWher God in fowrm
                    of bred his body doth present
